snippet: President Obama will attend the gathering, which has led to a wave of demonstrations by Peruvians hoping the international spotlight will help their causes....
lead_paragraph: President Obama will attend the gathering, which has led to a wave of demonstrations by Peruvians hoping the international spotlight will help their causes.

headline.main: Protests Erupt in Peru Ahead of Asia-Pacific Economic Meeting
headline.print_headline: Protests Erupt in Peru Ahead of Asia-Pacific Economic Event
